titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mr. William Moore, late fellow of Caius Colledge, and keeper of the University-Library as it was delivered in a sermon preached at his funeral-solemnity, April 24, 1659, in St Maries Church in Cambridge / by Tho. Smith ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, 1623 or 4-1661.
Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, printer to the University of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
"The last words which were writ by ... Dr. Hammond, being two prayers for the peaceful re-settlement of this Church and state" : p. 1-11 at end.
